name: Fabricate
headline: Procurement for Hardware Teams
description: Hardware engineers spend a quarter of their time just figuring out how to get their parts made, and from who. Fabricate builds procurement software for hardware teams. We help engineers manage manufacturing feasibility and procurement across their suppliers, whether they're getting parts custom manufactured or buying them off-the-shelf.

# Purchasing Built for Hardware
Streamline your purchasing process with intelligent procurement software designed specifically for hardware teams.
[Book a Demo![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67781deeb8573bb848c7e7e0/67781deeb8573bb848c7e87e_arrow-right-02-sharp%20\(1\).svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67781deeb8573bb848c7e7e0/67781deeb8573bb848c7e87e_arrow-right-02-sharp%20\(1\).svg)](https://www.tryfabricate.com/</book-a-demo>)
![Hero Card ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67781deeb8573bb848c7e7e0/677bfc4a4a8ddaaf089689a5_Screenshot%202025-01-06%20at%2010.52.30%20AM.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67781deeb8573bb848c7e7e0/6778252bbad921dcfe645a79_yc.svg)

![Benefits Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67781deeb8573bb848c7e7e0/67781deeb8573bb848c7e89b_Wave%20Icon%2010.svg)
Smart Intake
Get your team started today using AI to guide through any request 
![Benefits Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67781deeb8573bb848c7e7e0/67781deeb8573bb848c7e89c_Wave%20Icon%2011.svg)
Effortless Quoting
Send, compare and select quotes from your suppliers all in one place
![Benefits Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67781deeb8573bb848c7e7e0/67781deeb8573bb848c7e89a_Wave%20Icon%2012.svg)
Sourcing Intelligence
Manage your suppliers and mitigate your supply chain risk with AI
![Benefits Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67781deeb8573bb848c7e7e0/67781deeb8573bb848c7e899_Wave%20Icon%2013.svg)
Built for Hardware
Automatically identify correct suppliers for your parts, based on process and requirements
# Level Up The Way You Buy
The current procurement workflow is one of the biggest bottlenecks in modern engineering. Fabricate changes that.
![Feature Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67781deeb8573bb848c7e7e0/67781deeb8573bb848c7e899_Wave%20Icon%2013.svg)
Quit Wasting Time
25% of an engineers time is spent procuring their parts. This time should be spent engineering and designing.
![Feature Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67781deeb8573bb848c7e7e0/67781deeb8573bb848c7e89c_Wave%20Icon%2011.svg)
Cut Out The Repetition
Engineers waste countless hours creating RFQs and POs, managing email chains with suppliers, and searching for off-the-shelf component availability.
**80%** Time Save
1000s of Suppliers
![Feature Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67781deeb8573bb848c7e7e0/677c283e52586951b4394e38_674b981c040573bdb6812fe1_oraclesap.png)
# Seamlessly Integrates With your ERP
Fabricate can be used as a standalone platform or integrate directly with your ERP and purchasing software, so your approvers can stay in their own tools.
# Spend Smarter
Unlock the potential of your business with Fabricate.
[Book a Demo![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67781deeb8573bb848c7e7e0/67781deeb8573bb848c7e87e_arrow-right-02-sharp%20\(1\).svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67781deeb8573bb848c7e7e0/67781deeb8573bb848c7e87e_arrow-right-02-sharp%20\(1\).svg)](https://www.tryfabricate.com/</book-a-demo>)

generated_description:
### Fabricate: Transforming Hardware Procurement

**Company Overview**  
Fabricate is a forward-thinking company founded in 2024 as part of Y Combinator Batch F24, dedicated to revolutionizing the procurement process for hardware teams. Located in a flexible setting and operated by a small but focused team of just two employees, Fabricate addresses a significant pain point in hardware engineering: the cumbersome process of sourcing and procuring parts.

**Mission**  
At its core, Fabricate is about streamlining procurement for hardware engineers, who often find themselves spending up to 25% of their time navigating the complexities of getting parts manufactured or sourced. The company’s mission is to alleviate this burden by providing intuitive procurement software designed specifically for hardware teams.

**What They Offer**  
Fabricate's platform offers a suite of features that empower engineers to manage manufacturing feasibility and procurement across various suppliers—whether they are custom-manufactured parts or off-the-shelf components. Key functionalities include:

- **Smart Intake:** AI-driven assistance to guide teams through requests seamlessly.
- **Effortless Quoting:** A centralized hub to send, compare, and select quotes from multiple suppliers.
- **Sourcing Intelligence:** Tools to manage suppliers and mitigate supply chain risks effectively.
- **Integration with ERP Systems:** Fabricate can operate as a standalone solution or integrate with existing ERP and purchasing software.

**Why Fabricate Matters**  
Traditional procurement workflows can be the biggest bottlenecks in engineering. Fabricate aims to cut out repetitive tasks like creating RFQs and POs, managing countless email threads, and searching for available components. By doing so, the software promises to save engineers up to **80% of their procurement time**, allowing them to focus more on engineering and designing products.

**Backed by Experience**  
Pete Koomen is a notable Group Partner for Fabricate, lending his expertise to help elevate the company’s vision. The startup is categorized under tags such as artificial intelligence, B2B, and manufacturing, emphasizing its innovative approach to the hardware procurement space.

**Get Connected**  
For hardware teams looking to enhance their procurement processes, Fabricate provides a clear path to smarter spending. You can check out their offerings or book a demo on their website: [tryfabricate.com](https://www.tryfabricate.com).

In a world where time is often wasted on logistics rather than innovation, Fabricate is positioning itself to be a game-changer for engineers everywhere.
